General.Name: Meteoric Resources NL
General.Description: Meteoric Resources NL explores for mineral tenements in Brazil, Canada, Western Australia, and Northern Territory. It explores for gold, copper, cobalt, diamond, and silver deposits. The company owns interests in the Palm Springs gold project, which covers an area of approximately 12,500 ha located in Western Australia; the Juruena project located in Brazil; Novo Astro gold project that covers 15 square kilometers situated in Brazil; and the Warrego North IOCG project located in the Northern Territory. It also holds interests in the Mulligan and Mulligan East, Beauchamp, and Iron Mask projects in Ontario, Canada. The company was incorporated in 2004 and is based in West Perth, Australia.
General.Address: 33 Ord Street, West Perth, WA, Australia, 6005
